other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis without Contrast
other_tests.findings: Bilateral pleural effusions with bilateral dependent atelectasis at the lung bases; slightly hyperdense fluid next to the ascending colon in the right lower abdominal quadrant, concerning for hematoma; small foci of air and muscle near the surgical site, likely post-surgical; normal appearance of the bladder, uterus, and adnexa; hyperdense fluid tracking in the pelvis concerning for hematoma extending from the surgical site.
